imdb.plot outline: Unbroken through the centuries since the Jomon Era, the ancient holy places of the Tohoku Region of Japan provide awe-inspiring and breathtaking views and experiences for modern visitors. Nestled on Japan's Honshu Island and known for its many volcanoes and mountainous terrain, this historic region is where the spirit and rich culture of Japan collide with modern life.
imdb.title: Visiting Sacred Places of the Tohoku Region
akas: Visiting Sacred Places of the Tohoku Region (Japan)
plot: Unbroken through the centuries since the Jomon Era, the ancient holy places of the Tohoku Region of Japan provide awe-inspiring and breathtaking views and experiences for modern visitors. Nestled on Japan's Honshu Island and known for its many volcanoes and mountainous terrain, this historic region is where the spirit and rich culture of Japan collide with modern life.
